title: BRING CHAMPIONSHIP RIVEN BACK !

embed.description: League of Legends Championship Riven Skin. Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Riven on her Championship Skin All footage was taken in game. For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights Haven't got a LoL Account?

body:
Hi guys !
Too many LoL Players who are playing in the season5, didnt already play as Championship riven got released ! 
Also, too many LoL Players who got Champion ship riven do not play LoL anymore !
It would be nice for so many People if Riot could make a week, where Championship riven is available in the shop ! 
It's not fair that so many summoners who play LoL just since the beginning of season3 hadnt even 1 Chance to buy this Skin !
So i am speaking for the many LoL Players who want this Skin so hardly but cannot get this Skin except buying him on ebay for 50euros!
Bring Championship Riven Back !

I love this skin but i cant get it because i only started to play LOL in s4{{champion:92}}

meiner Meinung nach wäre es unfair den Skin wieder in den Shop zu bringen. Dein Argument, dass viele Spieler damals noch nicht gespielt haben ist komplett unsinnig, da dir ja dann theoretisch auch 1 000 000 ip zustehen würden, da es ja auch Spieler gibt die diese besitzen. Zudem wurde der skin auf ebay mit 300euro+ gehandelt. Genau wie die PAX Skins ist es ein Sammlerstück, welches langjährige Mitglieder des Spiels belohnen soll.
